title: Two Previews of Forthcoming Releases
content: Greater Albion Typefounders has just published previews of it's next two releases, Mellin Sans and Svengali Roman. They can be viewed on our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020025500/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/), as usual. Pop by and have a look at what's coming. In the meantime, our current new release is the decorative 1920s Roman family, Bonnin, currently offered on [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020025500/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bonning/) at a 40% discount.
author: Rasendyll
